author: Richard A. Webster, , Emma Brown, and and Kimberly Kindy, The Washington Post
title: New Orleans police jailing people for minor offenses as city becomes hot spot...
description:
NEW ORLEANS - One man was accused of stealing whiskey from a drugstore. A homeless man had allegedly refused to leave a hotel lobby. A woman had walked out of a grocery store without paying for a cart full of food worth $375, according to the police.
